==Trivia==
* This soundtrack cannot immediately play upon entering the Nameless Ruins subarea as ''Decayed in the Darkness'' is guaranteed to play instead. ''A Shard From Past Glories'' will then play on loop after ''Decayed in the Darkness'' finishes playing or after exiting combat.
* {{Transclude|Decayed in the Darkness|NamelessRuinsTheme1|section=1}}
